body:
See gist here https://gist.github.com/goxberry/e2fdb6dca02bb4ab132f3515a6e02f18 for full details. 

It seems like the crash in building `suite-sparse` is due to the way `spack` handles OpenMP flags: for `appleclang`, it assumes that lack of OpenMP is a hard failure for all packages.

Would adding an `openmp` variant to packages that can disable OpenMP, like `suite-sparse`, be accepted in a pull request?
title: spack install suite-sparse fails with appleclang
